statements: DELETE FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 500 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';

DELETE FROM feedback_analysis WHERE feedback_id = 100 AND operation_id = 200;
DELETE FROM OperationFeedbackMapping WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01');
